mapper.select: SELECT CODE_ID AS CODEID, CODE_NAME AS CODENAME, GRP_CODE_ID AS GRPCODEID, GRP_CODE_NAME AS GRPCODENAME FROM CODE WHERE GRP_CODE_ID = '001'
